content: संख्या {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To count, enumerate, calculate, sum up; तावंत्येव च तत्त्वानि सांख्यैः संख्यायंते <ls>Ś. B.</ls> {@--2@} <ab>Ved.</ab> To appear along with, be connected with.

संख्या {@--1@} Enumeration, reckoning, calculation; संख्यामिवैषां भ्रमरश्चकार <ls>R. 16. 47.</ls> {@--2@} A number. {@--3@} A numeral. {@--4@} Sum. {@--5@} Reason, understanding, intellect. {@--6@} Deliberation, reflection. {@--7@} Manner.
